rows.label: bf11110100_0010
rows.name: I see... So that's when...

rows.label: bf11110100_0015
rows.name: What a sad, sad tale, Laura..

rows.label: bf11110100_0018
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]adlib weeping at sadness of tale

rows.label: bf11110100_0020
rows.name: Oh, here we go again...

rows.label: bf11110100_0040
rows.name: Don't let it get cold, now.

rows.label: bf11110100_0090
rows.name:
So then, how come you've enlisted
with a band of mercenaries?

rows.label: bf11110100_0100
rows.name: I guess I like the freedom.

rows.label: bf11110100_0110
rows.name:
This way I'm not tied down, so I can help out
with causes I really believe in, you know?

rows.label: bf11110100_0120
rows.name:
Going's tough everywhere you look these days, right?
I can't ignore it, can I?

rows.label: bf11110100_0130
rows.name: I understand.

rows.label: bf11110100_0140
rows.name:
Fat load of good that'll do in the long run.
The world keeps turning anyway.

rows.label: bf11110100_0150
rows.name: You might think that.

rows.label: bf11110100_0160
rows.name:
But mercenaries and statesmen each have
their own views and ways to effect change.

rows.label: bf11110100_0170
rows.name: It's not in vain.

rows.label: bf11110100_0180
rows.name:
Huh. A Blade siding with humans...
You don't see that every day.

rows.label: bf11110100_0190
rows.name: I think it's Blades like you that are rare.

rows.label: bf11110100_0200
rows.name: Well, duh! You do know what I am, right?

rows.label: bf11110100_0210
rows.name: Lacking in compassion.

rows.label: bf11110100_0220
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?!

rows.label: bf11110100_0230
rows.name:
Blades like you really are a rare sight.
That may be for the best.

rows.label: bf11110100_0240
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ngh!

rows.label: bf11110100_0250
rows.name:
So about Shin..
I suppose you have to take him away from me.

rows.label: bf11110100_0260
rows.name: I could try to slay you right here...

rows.label: bf11110100_0270
rows.name: But...?

rows.label: bf11110100_0280
rows.name: But my mission is to stop the Grail's destruction...

rows.label: bf11110100_0290
rows.name:
To subdue Metsu.
Not to seek out lost trinkets.

rows.label: bf11110100_0300
rows.name: Who cares about Paragons anyway?

rows.label: bf11110100_0310
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf11110100_0320
rows.name:
How about...
you two join up, lend us your strength?

rows.label: bf11110100_0330
rows.name:
You're incredibly powerful. There's loads I want to
pick up from you...like that trick from before!

rows.label: bf11110100_0340
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: bf11110100_0350
rows.name:
We'll say I found the Paragon on my journey...
And decided to entrust him to you.

rows.label: bf11110100_0360
rows.name: To help with Metsu.

rows.label: bf11110100_0370
rows.name: Well? Sound plausible?

rows.label: bf11110100_0380
rows.name: That's just...
